charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] stopped in town
during [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] travels for a little rest and relaxation.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1101_0200_:
Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard laughter 
coming from close by.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_0400_:
Who would have thought I would find Rage
Candy Bars on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_0500_:
Ah, it’s been too long since I tasted this!
No need to be polite! Have some yourself!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1100_:
These are Rage Candy Bars!
They are my favorite!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1200_:
I lost myself in the excitement of being able to
eat these...
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1300_: I’m embarrassed you had to see that.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0302_1600_: I must admit I was surprised.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_1700_:
Yes... I know it is vastly different 
from how I normally act.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1900_:
But that’s behind us now.
I welcome you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2000_: Have some Rage Candy Bars. Relax with us.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2100_: Machamp looks happy to see you as well.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_2300_: If you have no urgent matters to attend to, rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_2400_: A moment of respite will do wonders for you.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_2600_: Yes, I come to this village often to relax.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_2700_: I come here often with Machamp.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2800_:
You train hard when you train, and you rest
hard when you rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2900_: That is the secret to training with longevity!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3000_:
You’re a Trainer, so you know 
how important it is to rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_3400_:
You must rest if you want to become stronger.
That’s all I wanted to say.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_3500_:
It might seem roundabout, but resting is an
important part of training.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3600_:
I believe that training is something you do to
elevate yourself and not to challenge yourself.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3700_:
If you continue training without rest, 
you may indeed become stronger 
but your spirit will suffer for it.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3800_:
That kind of strength...
That is not what Machamp and I yearn for.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3900_:
You must hone your spirit along with your
muscles to gain true strength.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_4100_:
Machamp and I train the same way, and we
rest the same way.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_4300_:
Machamp and I train the same way, and we
rest the same way.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4400_:
We can understand each other 
because we both go through 
the same pleasures and the same hardships.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4500_:
We want to become stronger not only for
ourselves but for each other as well.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4600_:
That is what drives us to become stronger than
we have ever been.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4800_:
And that path goes on forever. We will continue
training our minds and bodies like this.
